definition: to rain/(of rain, snow etc) to fall/to precipitate/to wet
capacity/quantity/amount/to estimate/abbr. for 量詞|量词[liang4 ci2], classifier (in Chinese grammar)/measure word

sentences.english: Amount of day precipitations in in, cm or mm.
sentences.chinese: 每天以英寸，厘米，毫米的降雨量。

sentences.english: The rainfall in this area averages 800mm a year.
sentences.chinese: 这个地区降雨量年均800毫米。

sentences.english: The method is straightforward, it is applicable to design precipitation station for those regions where precipitation station is spare.
sentences.chinese: 该法简单，适用于雨量站稀少地区的雨量站网规划。

sentences.english: The method is straightforward, it is applicable to design precipitation station for those regions where precipitation station is spare.
sentences.chinese: 该法简单，适用于雨量站稀少地区的雨量站网规划。

sentences.english: The whole of the area has less than 250mm rainfall a year.
sentences.chinese: 这个地区一年降雨量少于250毫米。
这里的年降雨量平均为700毫米。

sentences.english: The heaviest rainfall amounts occur west-southwest of Shanghai.
sentences.chinese: 降雨量最大的地区位于上海的西部及西南部。

sentences.english: Rainfall, by contrast, seemed to contribute little to agricultural production trends.
sentences.chinese: 与之相比，降雨量反而显得对农业生产影响很小。

sentences.english: The rainfall is governed by weather patterns that move in annual cycles.
sentences.chinese: 降雨量受气候模式控制，一年一次循环往复。

sentences.english: This brings dry air over the African continent, reducing rainfall.
sentences.chinese: 这为非洲大陆带来了更多干燥的空气，减少了降雨量。

sentences.english: Rainfall is plentiful in the area.
Two case-studies are made of these meso-systems.
sentences.chinese: 分析了两个中型系统影响雨量分布的实例。

sentences.english: Cuba could get torrential rainfalls of up to 30 inches.
sentences.chinese: 古巴的骤雨降雨量达到了30英寸。

sentences.english: Magnesium deficiency most commonly occurs in acid, sandy soils in areas of moderate to high rainfall .
sentences.chinese: 缺镁常常发生在中雨量或高雨量区的酸性砂质土。

sentences.english: Magnesium deficiency most commonly occurs in acid, sandy soils in areas of moderate to high rainfall .
sentences.chinese: 缺镁常常发生在中雨量或高雨量区的酸性砂质土。

sentences.english: The process of rainfall was recorded by siphon recording rain gauge.
sentences.chinese: 同时由虹吸式自记雨量计记录降雨量。
